snippet.title: Tanzia Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Buy Tanzia now on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/369700/

Unravel the mystery of your grandfather's disappearance while preventing a terrible evil from destroying your island home. Tanzia is a single-player RPG Adventure that combines fast-paced strategic combat with elements of favorite classic RPGs in an open 3D world of magic and monsters.

Tanzia was inspired by favorite classics like Dragon Quest and The Legend of Zelda.  Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates.

Follow us on Twitter!
@ArcanityInc
@PlayTanzia

http://www.playtanzia.com
http://store.steampowered.com/app/369700/
